channel.title: How do i set a player limit?
channel.description:
im retarded so i dont know this, please help me? (:
and how to i set a massing timer on my theiving tables?

item.title: How do i set a player limit?
item.dc:creator: @zuppers zuppers
item.description:
@zuppers wrote:

ROFL anyone with half a brain could figure this one out.

EDIT
declare this

int players = PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount()

if(players > 39) { Print.ln("[SERVER]"+playerName+" world full"); disconnected = true; returnCode = 7; }

add what ever you use to stop loading ect…

Read full topic
item.source: How do i set a player limit?

item.title: How do i set a player limit?
item.dc:creator: @Java_Is_My_Bitch Java Is My Bitch™
item.description:
@Java_Is_My_Bitch wrote:

PlayerHandler.java

The int maxplayers.

Set The Max Players.

Btw i tried that, server always crashes. I have to re-do all playerhandler.java =(.

Could be differnt for you though.
